website_summaries.verdict: Ideal concealer for covering blemishes while also helping to clear them up quickly.
pros: Gives a natural finish and is easy to blend
Contains salicylic acid to help clear skin while concealing blemishes and other imperfections
cons: Not ideal for dry skin or for using under eyes due to the salicylic acid

customer_reviews.title: Fake/Bad 1-Star Version of an Otherwise Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item four times now – twice from Amazon, and twice from a local drug store chain. Both times I bought it from the drug store, it worked great. The color blended seamlessly into my fair skin tone and shrank pimples fast. Sometimes I didn’t even need to put powder on over it. Both times I bought it from Amazon, however, it looked orange when I blended it in to my skin – even under powder. I don’t know what went wrong with the version Amazon is selling, but it is hot garbage. I cannot stress this enough – IF YOUR COVER-UP LOOKS ORANGE, IT’S FAKE/A BAD BATCH. Buy elsewhere; it’s worth the few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: rawknroll

customer_reviews.title: This medicated concealer really works
customer_reviews.text: On my 62nd birthday I was gifted 3 zits which was a shock since I haven't had a breakout in a long, long, long time. I didn't know what to use to get rid of the annoying scourge and happened upon this medicated concealer so decided to give it a try. In just a couple of days 2 were gone completely and the 3rd was hardly noticeable. The coverage is light, not thick or cakey, yet conceals very well and it blends perfectly with my tinted moisturizer (also Neutrogena). I'm so glad I bought this miracle in a tube, however I hope I don't need to use it again anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Orange cheeto color😤
customer_reviews.text: The product is bad. I got 05 fair it is dark orange. I have pale skin and im a porcelain in most shades I ordered because it said fair was the lightest, not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for years, it's a holy grail product for me. I don't see any point in covering up a blemish unless you're also trying to clear it up. This blends seamlessly into my skin and definitely helps to clear up blemishes while it covers. Super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin77

customer_reviews.title: While the product is fine, the applicator I cannot stand
customer_reviews.text: While the product is fine, the applicator I cannot stand. There is very little control over how much or how little comes out with each "click." I ended up wasting a ton and having to use a q tip to apply.
customer_reviews.author: CThib

customer_reviews.title: It does have a healing affect and doesn't look like make-up, so he does apply it and feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually got this for my extremely fair teenage son. It does have a healing affect and doesn't look like make-up, so he does apply it and feel good about it. He says he likes it better than Murad, which is more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Milan New England Mom

customer_reviews.title: I use it for pores...not acne!
customer_reviews.text: I use this because it seems to shrink the look of enlarged pores. I don't really get acne but it works well for my needs. Will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Jina

customer_reviews.title: Blends pretty nicely for my super fair skin
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I have bought several times. It doesn't seem to further clog skin and may even slightly speed up my skin clearing up when I am breaking out. Blends pretty nicely for my super fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: not even close to my skin tone, doesn't cover up well, and doesn't seem to work
customer_reviews.text: not even close to my skin tone and the other shade would be even worse Im afraid. Also, it doesn't cover up well, and doesn't seem to work as far as treating blemishes. Super liquidy. had to crank it like 20 times before anything came out, so it's already halfway used up even though ive only used it once–there's so much air in the tube that you don't get much coverup. I love neutrogena but hated this product
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Good formula
customer_reviews.text: I have olive skin and tan easily in the summer. I like this product during the summer months, but it will be too dark for me come winter. The formula is thick enough to cover small breakouts without having to reapply throughout the day. The applicator head is ok, I just wish there was more concealer and that it would come out easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fair is not fair!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchsed this product in the past from the drug store so I was excited to find it much cheaper on Amazon. I always wear Fair, which blends perfectly with my skin tone. The Fair shade of this product provided by Amazon is so orange! It does not look good at all and just makes my blemishes more obvious. Maybe I should get an orange foundation and just go for the Oompah Loompah look. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Biewen

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I usually just use the Murad acne concealer but they stopped production of that line already. I saw good reviews for the Neutrogena acne concealer and decided to try it. It was okay. The texture is very liquidy, not creamy at all, so it is very very blendable. But that was the problem. It's too blendable that you swipe it once and it's gone. You don't cover anything unless you put a lot, which is not good either. I use it for small red dots nowadays but for bigger marks I think it's better to use a creamier concealer with more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight! Not greasy.
customer_reviews.text: I really love Neutrogena makeup. I had quit buying it because it was so expensive in the store. I love that I can get at an affordable price on here. I mainly use this concealer to cover the dark circles under my eyes. I feel like it does a great job and it only takes a small amount. I also like that you can control how much of the product you are using by twisting the top. It is very light weight and not greasy. I got the fair, and I feel that it matches my complexion very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brookie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: This is a good medicated cover up for the odd blemish. It doesn't really get rid of blemishes though; I have stronger applications for that. But I feel better knowing it's medicated.
customer_reviews.author: LaBelle  Coeur

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years. Love that it conceals and helps acne all in one step. Very light coverage that blends in well. Only wish it lasted a little longer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny D

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite concealer. It definitely helps reduce the size of zits, even after just a day of application. It's not going to cover things up perfectly, but it's a great quick solution for taking the edge off of the redness and obviousness of spots without having to suffocate your skin.
customer_reviews.author: ShellBell

customer_reviews.title: Messed up product... may have been stored on the warehouse too long
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t like the ones you buy from the store. It is super orangy and makes me look like I have a bad spray tan on my pimple and takes a good amount of foundation to cover up. I would only get if you absolutely have to or need something. It didn’t make me break out but I only used once. It is bummer because I thought I would relive my middle school simple makeup routine while I am living more outdoorsy in Montana. This product is great for spot coverage of you BUY ONLY AT A STORE.
customer_reviews.author: Brylie Mondfrans

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. Have bought it again and probably will continue. Is exactly what it says it is. I had been using a different product but didn't like the way it left my skin feeling. This works great. Well worth the purchase. ty
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: $6 cheaper than what I get at the drug store
customer_reviews.text: It is a _lot_ cheaper on Amazon. I love this stuff. If I have to wear something for acne blemishes it isn't as bad as other products. It has salicylic acid. It's not too heavy and blends well into my skin tone. I've been buying this for a few years. Really hope they keep making it
customer_reviews.author: Hope Russell

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is light/med
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine. But I have used other brands that I much prefer. This one has ok coverage. Medium is a little on the darker side.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to blend and apply onto your face
customer_reviews.text: I really like the application tip on this product. It’s so easy to use, twist the bottom to dispense onto the soft brush tip and blot onto the skin without having to use fingertips to touch your face. Good coverage too and supposedly helps to heal acne. I’m fair skinned but glad I chose the next level up instead of the fairest so I don’t look like I have blotches off sunscreen on my spots.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Mira

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer! It makes me feel good about trying to cover my blemishes because I know it's healing at the same time. The color blends in nicely. It's also handy to keep in my purse to touch up when I'm out. I'll definitely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Effective/affordable product, but Fair has a violent orange tone
customer_reviews.text: It's smooth and nice on the skin--definitely preventing the loop of acne->hide with makeup->get more acne because of makeup. Other reviewers definitely aren't exaggerating about the Fair tone, though. It's very orange tinted, and you will notice. It blends okay with some powder foundation and I'm sure no one else notices it--but you won't be able to ignore it. This listing is cheaper than drug store prices, which sort of offsets the tiny volume of product. With daily use, it'll last a month tops, depending on how much coverage you need. I really like the applicator. Probably won't buy again because of the orangeness, which is a shame because it's pretty nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blemish hider and fighter
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is an incredibly cheap and effective concealer than will not clog your pores and actively fights acne due to the salicylic acid presence. Don’t spend tons of money on other products when there is a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Orow

customer_reviews.title: Works but looks weird
customer_reviews.text: Works like a concealer but drys out zits toot sweet. The shades avail dont compliment my skin tone at all so I can only use this under more make up and not on its own or else I look like I am covering up pox :/
customer_reviews.author: Christina Castaneda-Hull

customer_reviews.title: Long time user.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite make up product. I have used it for many years through different make up levels: from light powder to full foundation, this has been my go to. Currently I only wear make up once in a while, but I still use this each time I get a blemish. A little dab will cover the blemish while the salicylic acid works to kill the bacteria all day. No need to cover the cover up with powder if the shade matches your skin color.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear2020

customer_reviews.title: Conceals with no irritation or build up
customer_reviews.text: The tone I bought was "fair" and it covers perfectly. I had one little tiny scratch on my chin from my ring. Covers with no build up and it actually lasts. I bought another just for my trip to St Lucia.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of the Almay one I normally buy. I feel like this has great coverage but is still light enough that it doesn't feel heavy. Also, this was $4.50 cheaper on Amazon than at Walgreens. I'd buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It works well and doesn’t make my acne prone skin break out. The only downside is there isn’t a lot of product in there so value for money isn’t the highest. I really like it though so I keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Orange 👎
customer_reviews.text: This is normally a fabulous product. I ordered 05 and 09 They were both different shades of orange. The colors were not even similar to the ones I bought from Target , which were good skin tone colors for non- orange folk
customer_reviews.author: t  mo

customer_reviews.title: Light Coverage but helps with acne!
customer_reviews.text: My old concealer cause breakouts where my glasses would sit on my nose! I didn't realize it was my concealer until I came across this product! I was curious to see the results and I am very happy. After 3 weeks of using this product, I can tell my acne on my nose has cleared up! The only negative for me is this product does take multiple applications to get you to a nice cover, but it never felt cakey or oily for me which I appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, not causing acne
customer_reviews.text: Neutrogena is the only cosmetic brand that does not cause acne after applying. It also provides good coverup. It’s hard to find neutrogena cosmetics in CVS/supermarket nowadays. Glad to find it online.
customer_reviews.author: L. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Look your best
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the secret to ageless beauty. Better looking features make my face look number one at any party I go to. I also wear it to work and get complements. This product deserves your attention and demands it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: reliable
customer_reviews.text: My go to zit cover up. Not sure it helps the blemishes go any more quickly, but it doesn't make them worse (which is a big deal).
customer_reviews.author: JZuver

customer_reviews.title: So great for once in awhile
customer_reviews.text: Product is thin in consistency. Works well on small blemishes but does tend to oxidize a little bit on my skin. So great for once in awhile. Wouldn't use for a big event etc
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good. I have been having a problem with acne ...
customer_reviews.text: New to this product, but so far so good. I have been having a problem with acne lately. I have completely changed my regiment. This is something new to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer 101

customer_reviews.title: Good concept
customer_reviews.text: Did it breakout my skin? No. Did it clear up blemishes? No. Its okay for areas your concerned about upsetting your skin in. Is it my holy grail? no. but it was worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot for your $
customer_reviews.text: Click click click. . . Took forever for product to come out, does not contain a lot of concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fair 05 darker than it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought Fair 05 to replace an old tube from 2012. The new one is at least a shade darker than the old. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed by this product. It just seats on the too of my skin even if I try to blend it in. It changes texture and doesn’t cover anything. Completely Useless. But nothing negative to say about the seller.
customer_reviews.author: soheir

customer_reviews.title: I dont usually write
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this fair color matches my skin perfectly! I'm not snow white but I sure dont have much of a tan. It goes on thin and i like that. I use my fingertip to apply, i have more control that way. I like the fact that it treats as it covers. I have had acne for 25 years ( yes that long! ) and this is the best I have found. PERIOD! From now on I will use nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very orange
customer_reviews.text: I use a makeup stick very similar to this. I love the salicylic acid because it helps your zit shrink while hiding it; however this was very orange.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hess

customer_reviews.title: Not a good cover up
customer_reviews.text: It’s better as a acne medicine than a coverup it’s too ,igniting weight to go over a blemish. This color is also very light.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 2 years now and I love it! It's the easiest to apply and the coverage is perfect for minor blemishes and acne!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing skin results
customer_reviews.text: I really think this has helped with clearing my skin! It does get a little cakey after a long day but for what it has done to my skin I accepted this con.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Giroux

customer_reviews.title: Nice concealer and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer. The sponge on the end makes application easy and I like that it's not just concealer but also acne medication.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Pattiecake

customer_reviews.title: Comes out watery sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fair deal but sometimes it comes out watery and you gotta wipe it away and get a new fresh bead of concealer. Kinda wasteful
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Good but got a different that was more for my money
customer_reviews.text: I think it worked? Didn't last long. Got different concealer that's more for my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good concealer
customer_reviews.text: My go to concealer for the past few years. Perfect coverage for blemishes when you find the right color
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Got this fir a man It’s small and dies the job Less girly to hold And cheaper if it fir men
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: EFFECTIVE, GOOD CONCEALER
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They do help clear imperfections while hiding them. DO NOT USE AS A CONCEALER UNDER YOUR EYES. It's too strong. If you're a no foundation girl like I am, this has a nice MATTE look to camouflage the occasional pink or red bump. I wouldn't use or touch the applicator though. Keep it as close to disinfected as possible by taking a daub of the product with a q-tip or something.
customer_reviews.author: Always Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Best product out there to heal or quickly fix up blemishes. The best!
customer_reviews.author: LJC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I promise, it helps make the blemish not only look better but it helps heal it! Win win!
customer_reviews.author: annmarie p.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for covering and treating inflamed acne!!
customer_reviews.text: The only makeup I put on my cystic acne flare ups! I found wearing this concealer during a breakout actually helps clear it up faster than nothing at all!! With cystic acne anything helps it was so relieving to find a makeup product that clears and covers like this one! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CosmoMom

customer_reviews.title: It dries up in the nozzle after sitting a while
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to know the color to choose before you buy it. But other than that, and having to unclog the dry clump in the nozzle after not being used for a while, it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Scott

customer_reviews.title: I order 2 and only received 1
customer_reviews.text: The product is good I use it all the time, I like the texture, it works fine, there’s nothing wrong with the product, only problem is that I order 2 and only received 1
customer_reviews.author: pamela brill

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product. I wish the tube came with more since I am already running out. Covers the scars well.... not sure about the skin clearing portion yet since I have only been using it for about three weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cover up for blemishes
customer_reviews.text: I like this product since it has silica acid so it treats your blemishes while covering it up.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I like Neutrogena's products as it works well with my oily ...
customer_reviews.text: I like Neutrogena's products as it works well with my oily and acne prone skin. This concealer provides good coverage and treats the acne simultaneously which is perfect! It doesn't clog my pore. I wish it last longer though, the stick is fairly small and although a little goes a long way, it runs out quickly. Decent for the price of $5.90 though!
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: It is a very light coverage product though and I like something that will be more thicker consistency to cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth. It is a very light coverage product though and I like something that will be more thicker consistency to cover up blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not enough variety of colors and too thin for my dark under eye circles
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Matches skin tone perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this every day and it doesn't clog pores or look greasy. She wishes there was more in each tube because she runs out quickly, but this is by far her favorite and her skin looks great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great to cover what you don't want anyone to see
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to apply to either dark or light spots you need to cover up. I usually cover my spots first, then do something else to get ready while the concealer dries. Once it dries, I can put on my foundation and the foundation goes over top of the concealer. I get a good coverage and conceal all I don't want anyone to see.
customer_reviews.author: Poppie

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: Generally love Neutrogena products. I was disappointed with this for several reasons. First color match was not good at all way too dark. Second, it does not go on smoothly— sort of clumpy and awkward looking. Third, does not cover the red marks of acne enough even with layering. However, I do love the tube applicator. It’s very handy and convenient howeve product inside not great!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie 865

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and helps fight acne!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Blends well and helps fight acne. I dont have it bad, but its a helping make up. ive been using for about 4 years now! Love it. Light on skin and goes well under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: True to skin color
customer_reviews.text: Color was true to skin color. Like the fact that there are choices for the color. Long-wearing, even in hot weather!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite concealer, I’ve used this for years. It covers well and helps heal breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Does not blend well and is super noticeable. It isn't really better to have a noticeable light spot than just the blemish itself. It also didn't help my skin to clear at all.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle mama

customer_reviews.title: Low coverage, but feels good on skin
customer_reviews.text: Low to medium coverage, but feels good on my skin. I feel better using this than makeup that clogs my pores. It isn’t going to cover a lot of redness though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Covers my acne and acne scar really well. Make sure to choose the right shade for you skin color, or else it would look unnatural.
customer_reviews.author: J.U.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t as helpful and I thought. I like the size but it’s too difficult to use. I would rather use the stick hydrating concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This is my "go-to"...
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this conceal, but it helps heal at the same time. This is my "go-to" everyday solution. Thank you Neutrogena!
customer_reviews.author: C. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how well this works
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this product would be too light, and questioned the quality based on it being a drugstore brand. Pleasantly surprised that it actually blends really easily and covers any blemish. Seems to also dry up blemishes. Happy I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine O.

customer_reviews.title: Good concealer with acne medication in it
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s pretty pricey, but it’s worth it. It lasts a good while and covers up my acne blemishes well
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: So effective that I've already reordered.
customer_reviews.text: Ideal coverup for fair skin while it works to clear up blemishes. I already reordered!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Skin Clearing Concealer review- 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job, it conceals and fights acne very well. The reason I gave it 3 out of 5 stars is because of the shade. It is so pink-based that I need to put a green color corrector over or underneath it in order for the area in which I applied it to match the rest of my face. My only remarks on this are that you need a green concealer or face primer in order to use this product to counteract the pink. I would recommend that Neutrogena make more yellow-based products in general as well.
customer_reviews.author: reneekk

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my buddy on his wedding day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a groom on his wedding day. He used it and helped 💯 make his blemishes go away.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on line instead of picking it up locally. Price was right. I’ve been using this for years.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Really good to cover your acne
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good to cover your acne. I already bought two. It is good!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product . But we ordered light , and it's way to dark for our skin color .
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Great for small blemishes
customer_reviews.text: Very best concealer I've used. Covers small blemishes beautifully. I'm really fair and it doesn't darken.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: i think i like this product
customer_reviews.text: i think i like this product. I haven't had to use it tons yet. Seems to be a little finicky on getting it to come out
customer_reviews.author: djrob

customer_reviews.title: Covers without clumping
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of twisting to get the liquid to dispense (only at first), and then it was perfect - like airbrushing! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: barbara feinstein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The color matched and is compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up while healing
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time now if I have a breakout
customer_reviews.author: Nikkiw51779

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this really decreases acne, but it does provide good solid coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander F

customer_reviews.title: I like the coverage as a concealer but it'd be hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage as a concealer but it'd be hard to use by itself as it shows up splotchy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your
customer_reviews.text: it irritated my skin from the first use and was discontinued. Color is very light. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: NJNY

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Not sure how much it works but I feel better wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: only four stars because it is way lighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paola L. Maria-mateo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great to have the extra benefit of the acid in the concealer
customer_reviews.author: dbillauer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great- I wear very minimal makeup, if any, and this was barely visible and blended very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Peni V.

customer_reviews.title: Bad costumer service
customer_reviews.text: Very orange. Not a good formula break down. Seller never contacted me about a refund. Or even got back to me do not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Trandy

customer_reviews.title: Hide a spot
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cover up for blemishes and other flaws out there for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Taylour Trunzo

customer_reviews.title: Not really "fair"
customer_reviews.text: I have very light skin and this came out sort of orange on my fair skin, despite being labeled as a "fair" color. Disappointed, probably can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lory

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy, effective
customer_reviews.text: Good color, easy applicator, and effectively dries blemish while covering.
customer_reviews.author: B.R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once but i like how it covers the redness of my breakouts
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Blending brush is useless. Poor coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Very liquidy. The “blending brush” is very stiff and doesn’t blend at all. Poor coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: Much better applications for blemish concerns
customer_reviews.text: Too dark, broke both me & my son out! It’s neutragena! It is not a good application
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: doesn't apply easily and dries leaving every pore twice as obvious as ...
customer_reviews.text: Darker than expected, doesn't apply easily and dries leaving every pore twice as obvious as before.
customer_reviews.author: H Larsen

product_meta.title: Neutrogena SkinClearing Blemish Concealer Face Makeup with Salicylic Acid Acne Medicine, Non-Comedogenic and Oil-Free Concealer Helps Cover, Treat & Prevent Breakouts, Buff 09,.05 oz
product_meta.description:
Color:Buff 09Conceal blemishes and help clear them up with Neutrogena SkinClearing Blemish Concealer Liquid Face Makeup. Providing natural-looking coverage, this double-duty concealer combines makeup with skincare to reduce the visibility of acne and other blemishes while also helping to improve your skin. The makeup formula contains Microclear technology with salicylic acid acne medicine to help quickly treat, eliminate and prevent pimples. Developed by dermatologists, Neutrogena SkinClearing Blemish Concealer is non-comedogenic and oil-free so it won't clog pores. Suitable for daily use, this acne clearing cover-up makeup can be easily incorporated into a regular skincare and beauty routine. Use this with other salicylic acid makeup products from Neutrogena such as the SkinClearing Liquid Makeup and SkinClearing Mineral Powder.

BRAND STORY
By Neutrogena Cosmetics
feature_bullets: .05-ounces of Neutrogena SkinClearing Blemish Concealer Liquid Face Makeup with salicylic acid to help treat and prevent breakouts while covering up pimples
This 2 in 1 blemish concealer provides natural-looking coverage to give you a beautiful and flawless look while helping diminish acne breakouts
Formulated with salicylic acid, a proven acne-fighting medicine, and Microclear technology, the makeup helps treat, clear, eliminate, and prevent blemishes
From a dermatologist-recommended brand, the acne cover-up makeup is suitable for daily use and can be incorporated into a regular acne treatment skincare regimen or facial beauty routine
Use this blemish concealer with other salicylic acid makeup products from Neutrogena such as the SkinClearing Liquid Makeup and SkinClearing Mineral Powder
